group_1.textRight: I didn't overhear what you girls were discussing,
but from the looks of it, it appears to be about@changing perceptions, or altering truths...
It's something along those lines, isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: ...What are you talking about?

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle*... You seem to be accustomed to hiding@your intentions.

group_1.textLeft: And you seem to be very confident.@There are four of us.
You are alone. I'm sure we will have no trouble@taking you down.

group_1.textRight: Alone, you say?
...You'd be mistaken.

group_1.textLeft: ...This magic...

group_1.textRight: What's with the sudden telepathy call@out of nowhere?
This cutie's in the middle of cleaning, y'know.@If you're not busy, why don't you lend a hand?
...Wait, what's the sitch here?

group_1.textLeft: Might you remember these girls?

group_1.textRight: Ah!
What the heck?@How'd I totally forget what happened earlier?!
They found out I was still alive, which is, like,@terrible to the max!
Catch on, and the spell is broken...@I hadn't expected her to have a companion nearby.
And her friend here is just outside of my magic's@range...

group_1.textLeft: Even with that, we're still four against two.
The fact that we have an advantage hasn't changed.
Could I ask for your assistance again, Meiyui?

group_1.textRight: It is a bit draining, but I have a Grief Seed.
My magic is only effective within a certain range@of the person I'm touching.
If I can target these guys when they are as close@as possible...
I should be able to use my magic on both of them@at once.

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll back you up again.

group_1.textRight: Me too. I'll give you my support!

group_1.textLeft: Well, let's get on with it, Princess.
Those who would interfere with Her Highness@must be punished.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, seriously.
I can't let anyone trick me when I'm about to reach@the top!

group_1.textLeft: Haaah!

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][chara:103100:effect_shake][chara:300800:effect_shake][se:4061_landing_jump5][surround:3046A02]Hmph!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102800:effect_7000_attack01][se:4012_equip_arms_longspear2_vh]Yah!

group_1.textRight: Ack!
All these dinky potshots are getting REALLY@annoying!

group_1.textLeft: (Alternating between weak attacks...)
(They're looking for an opening to break through,@aren't they...?)
Princess! Distance yourself from the enemy for now!

group_1.textRight: Gotcha!
I-it's no use... I can't close the gap at all.
Maybe they've figured out how your magic works,@Meiyui...

group_1.textLeft: They seem to be wary of me, too.

group_1.textRight: And that girl with the gatling gun's pretty tough...
I can't get any hits to stick.
Even using my unique magic,@I can't pick out any of her weak spots...

group_1.textLeft: While I would have liked to retreat as quickly@as possible, as things stand now,
I'm afraid that we'll have to play the long game@and try to wear our opponents down.
Besides, now that we've fought as much as we have,
if we don't do something about their memories,
we may run into trouble in the future...

group_1.textCenter: (If I'd known that someone else was coming,@we should have retreated sooner.)

group_1.narration: If our top priority is reporting back to the Union,@we could send Kako back to Kamihama@while the rest of us handle the fighting...
I don't know where these@girls' teammates might be hiding, though,@and I can't send Kako out@if there's a chance she'll be attacked...

group_1.textCenter: (Because...the lives of my friends take precedence.)

group_1.textRight: Instructor, what should we do?

group_1.textLeft: I'd wager that Miss Kung-Fu who used her magic@on you earlier
is similar to you in that her magic can only be@activated by touching her target's body.
In order for her to get close enough to us,@the others are trying to create an opening.

group_1.textRight: No way! That's some crazy teamwork.

group_1.textLeft: If she touches us, that spells a capital "The End"@for our story.
If we forget that we've ever met these girls,
we will be unable to realize just how much danger@we're in...
I could use my gatling gun to put up a barrage
while I ask you to call for backup,
but that's a question of whether or not@I can hold off four people alone...

group_1.textRight: Don't even think about it.
No matter how strong you say you are,@that's still way too dangerous.
Urgh... If only this cutie had perfected her magic...
I could use that girl's power to pull something off...
